name: Solidarity Driver
description:
"...streets are empty, the lone driver can hear no sound other than the roaring their minivan.
The city is in lockdown, the brave men and women of Solidarity Express cannot stop driving, to transport the basic needs to the community, in what feels like an endless shift..."

Game made for the Stay Safe Jam, theme: 'Solidarity'.

Controls ActionKeyboardGamepadTurn Left
Left Arrow
(or 'A')Left Thumbstick LeftTurn RightRight Arrow
(or 'D')Left Thumbstick RightSlow DownDown Arrow
(or 'S')Left Thumbstick Down
(or 'Left Trigger')PauseEscapeStart
